channel.title: blog on Kelly and Coffee
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Kelly and Coffee

item.title: Setting up Prose for Hugo
item.description: Setting up Prose.io for Hugo Setting up Prose.io for Hugo is a little less straight forward than for Jekyll; I tried to enter a bunch of metadata; but it feels a little - not needed.

item.title: Wortelkanaal is niet sexy
item.description: Ik heb al even wat last van een tand; mijn rechterpremolaar bovenaan.

item.title: Studying while working fulltime
item.description: I’ve recently changed employer; I swapped insurance for transport. I went from MS Amlin to Lineas; I now help drive a ‘Freight Force’.

item.title: Married
item.description: On Aug 13th 2021 I got married to the love of my life, Ziggy.

item.title: A day in the life of a remote worker
item.description: Recently, I was asked what my day looks like during this pandemic as it rendered me (like so many others) a full-time remote worker.

item.title: Window of tolerance
item.description: I have a therapist. Yes. Why? Oh, I could list a number of reasons, but suffice to say it is to better myself.

item.title: New job
item.description: On April 1st, I started a new job, or rather I switch roles.
